about.description:
DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

name: duckdb-split

about.description:
DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
install and easy to use.

DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "duckdb" %}
{% set version = "1.4.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}-split
  version: {{ version }}

source:
    # (!!) Please also update the git used for OVERRIDE_GIT_DESCRIBE in the build scripts.
  - url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/archive/refs/tags/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 91e55efe2c1627c4432d620ee9d2ffcd72f954699e76d7dab523348a7dfbb00a
    patches:
      - 0001-Dynamically-link-the-cli.patch
      - 0002-Remove-code-signature-before-applying-metadata-to-ex.patch
  - url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb-httpfs/archive/8356a9017444f54018159718c8017ff7db4ea756.tar.gz
    sha256: 712052e2def32b75876dd894894ab51fd4e6870a74f9c0411a1f31a9d00af628
    folder: extension/httpfs
  - url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb-fts/archive/39376623630a968154bef4e6930d12ad0b59d7fb.tar.gz
    sha256: b29888d124c424e0c4b502a46809f2c40c4575df6c20b0903a5e848fe527df44
    folder: extension/fts
  - url: https://github.com/duckdb/ducklake/archive/f134ad86f2f6e7cdf4133086c38ecd9c48f1a772.tar.gz
    sha256: f4c8dfe078235f900fddb1f5019cc9cf2bf9d9d6b0c0e58a1d1a9060de214c5b
    folder: extension/ducklake

build:
  number: 1
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ stdlib("c") }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - ninja
  host:
    - icu
    - openssl
    - libcurl

outputs:
  - name: libduckdb
    script: install-lib.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - openssl
        - icu
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libduckdb${SHLIB_EXT}
  - name: libduckdb-devel
    script: install-headers.sh
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", max_pin="x.x.x") }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/include/duckdb.h
  - name: duckdb-cli
    script: install-cli.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - duckdb -version
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-builtin-extensions.sh
      requires:
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-json
    script: noop.sh
    # Empty placeholder package as this now built-in
    # We need to use the same dependencies as in the main build to make it work in cross-compilation
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - exit 0
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpcds
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-autocomplete
    script: noop.sh
    # Empty placeholder package as this now built-in
    # We need to use the same dependencies as in the main build to make it work in cross-compilation
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - exit 0
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpcds
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-httpfs
    script: install-extension.sh
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
        - openssl
        - libcurl
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-fts
    script: install-extension.sh
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
        - openssl
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-tpch
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq
  - name: duckdb-extension-ducklake
    build:
      binary_relocation: false
    script: install-extension.sh
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('c') }}
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib("c") }}
        - cmake
        - ninja
        - python *
        - macholib
      host:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libduckdb", exact=True) }}
    test:
      commands:
        - {{ RECIPE_DIR }}/test-extension.sh
      requires:
        - duckdb-cli
        - jq

about:
  home: https://www.duckdb.org/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: An Embeddable Analytical Database
  description: |
    DuckDB is an embedded database designed to execute analytical SQL queries
    fast while embedded in another process. It is designed to be easy to
    install and easy to use.
  doc_url: https://duckdb.org/docs/index.html
  dev_url: https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - xhochy
    - janjagusch
    - flaviomartins
